channel.title: Instructions on Schrodingers Library
channel.description: Recent content in Instructions on Schrodingers Library

item.title: Detailed Instructions
item.description: After installing Schrodingers Library, you will be able to browse through our catalog. If you are looking for a specific book, search for the book with the use of the search bar. We won’t force you to create an account with us if you only want to see the books available and their ratings, but you can create an account if you would like to use our app at its full potential.
